title: Fonts used on the Jack Daniel's label... any clue?
content:
Any idea what fonts these may be? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120102172030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/D780~Jack-Daniel-s-Black-Label-Posters_4827.jpg)
author: scamp

comments.content: All hand lettered. [FF Jackie](http://web.archive.org/web/20120102172030/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_jackie/) was inspired by the script.
figured as much.... thank you though
